value.title: Man Group-Oxford Quants Say Their AI Can Predict Stock Moves
value.excerpt: Man Group Plc-backed researchers at the University of Oxford say they’ve created a machine-learning program that can project how share prices move -- notching an 80% success rate for the equivalent of about 30 seconds of live trading.

value.title: Neuromorphic Chip: Artificial Neurons Recognize Biosignals in Real Time
value.excerpt: Researchers from Zurich have developed a compact, energy-efficient device made from artificial neurons that is capable of decoding brainwaves. The chip uses data recorded from the brainwaves of epilepsy patients to identify which regions of the brain cause epileptic seizures.
